products.name: Reusable Bamboo Utensil Set
products.description: A set of eco-friendly, reusable bamboo utensils perfect for reducing single-use plastic waste. Includes a fork, knife, spoon, and chopsticks in a travel pouch.

products.name: Organic Cotton Tote Bag
products.description: Durable and stylish organic cotton tote bag for shopping, carrying books, or everyday use. Washable and biodegradable.

products.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Leak-proof, insulated stainless steel water bottle to keep beverages hot or cold for hours. Available in multiple colors.

products.name: Biodegradable Phone Case
products.description: Stylish and protective phone case made from biodegradable materials, offering a sustainable alternative to plastic cases.

products.name: Recycled Paper Notebook
products.description: Eco-friendly notebook made from 100% recycled paper, perfect for jotting down notes, sketches, or journaling.

products.name: Compostable Coffee Pods
products.description: Single-serve coffee pods made with compostable materials, compatible with most coffee machines. Available in various blends.

products.name: Eco-Friendly Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-toxic and biodegradable yoga mat made from natural tree rubber. Provides excellent grip and cushioning.

products.name: Solar-Powered LED Lantern
products.description: Rechargeable LED lantern powered by solar energy. Ideal for camping, emergency use, or outdoor lighting.

products.name: Plant-Based Laundry Detergent
products.description: Eco-friendly laundry detergent made from plant-based ingredients, free from harsh chemicals and gentle on fabrics.

products.name: Beeswax Food Wraps
products.description: Reusable beeswax wraps to replace single-use plastic wrap. Perfect for keeping food fresh and reducing waste.
